name: Jaybird Vista 2 True Wireless Headphones
description: These second generation wireless earbuds sounds better and last longer. Sound modes to reduce ambient noise – great for yoga in the park, or amplify sounds – so you can hear an electric car coming up behind you. Bluetooth 5.0 gives you up 4x the range of previous Bluetooth software. The case both protects and charges, with an additional 16 hours of playback power. It uses magnets, so there are no runaway earphone moments. And, if you discover your earphones are dead, the case can give a quick-charge boost of an hour of play with 5 minutes of charging.8 hour battery life plus extension from case.Case doubles as a charging dock, with up to 16 more hours of power.Active noise cancellation reduces ambient noise.4 integrated microphones and wind dense fabric for clear calls.CNC machined 6mm driver drivers deliver immersive sound with crisp detail.Surround sense amplifies ambient noises.Quick charging boosts: 1 hour of playback in just 5 minutes.LED charge indicator.Case charges in 2 hours via USB-C and is Qi wireless charging compatible.3 sizes of interchangeable silicone ear gels let you customize the fit.Bluetooth 5.0 pairs quickly and easily, has multi-point pairing, 40m range and uses less power.Free Jaybird app lets you customize your earphones with EQ settings, community support, controls and has a “find my buds” feature.Integrated buttons control music and calls.IP68 weatherproofing: protects from sweat, rain and accidental drops into puddles.In the box: Vista earphones, 3 sizes of custom fit ear gels, charging case, USB-C charging cable and documentation.
